title: Are items legit?
description: The items rented on our website are verified by our experts and are 100% real.

title: What is the return policy for rented items?
description: We offer a return option in the first 2 days upon arrival with no charge.

title: How do I track my order?
description: We will provide you with a prepaid shipping label when your item is sent to you. You can use the label to return the item back to us.
